commentBody:
As a physician taking care of youth concussions, I have taken a long hard look at the available data, and it's pretty alarming. CTE is real, and it can occur with repetitive sub-concussive hits, without any known "full-blown" concussions. My son wants to play football. He's 10. Knowing what his current IQ is, my response is learn soccer. Then try out for kicker.

And I fully own that it is hypocritical for me to watch and enjoy football, and not want my son to play it.
